wikipedia_page.main: Sir George Ian Clark Hutchison (4 January 1903 – 2 February 2002) was a Scottish Unionist Party politician. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Edinburgh West from 1941 to 1959.

link_mentions.page: List of MPs elected in the 1945 United Kingdom general election
List of MPs elected in the 1950 United Kingdom general election
List of MPs elected in the 1951 United Kingdom general election

response: Ian Clark Hutchison stood for the Unionist Party.  As he faced no opposition, he was declared elected.  It remains the last uncontested by-election in Scotland to date.
* Ian Clark Hutchison (1903–2002), full name George Ian Clark Hutchison, Scottish Unionist Party MP for Edinburgh West
*Lieutenant-Commander George Ian Clark Hutchison, RN (Retired), MP, Member of Parliament for West Edinburgh since 1941. For political and public services.
